explains: n. 墙面板；木瓦；小招牌（尤指医生或律师挂的营业招牌）；鹅卵石

sentences.en: The industry isn't regulated, so anybody can hang out a shingle.
sentences.cn: 这个行业无制度规范，所以任何人都可以开业。

sentences.en: He scraped away the dirt, and exposed a pine shingle.
sentences.cn: 他刮掉泥土，露出一块松木瓦。

sentences.en: They are waiting on the shingle—will you come and join the dance?
sentences.cn: 他们正在等着跳舞呢——你来参加舞会好吗？
